title: Day 21 - The Scarecrow In My Backyard
itunes:title: Day 21 - The Scarecrow In My Backyard
itunes:subtitle: The Bad Days
description:
Do you ever hear a bump in the night? And you tell yourself that you're just imagining things? What would you do if something was there? And what is that something was even worse than you could imagine?

***

Credited to Some Guy

***

Please consider supporting the podcast at Patreon.com/Creepypod

***

Sound Design by Steve Blizin

***

Title music by Alex Aldea

***

Intro/Outro Narration by Joe Stofko
